description: Try our easy to follow Snow White Caramel Apples recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Snow White Caramel Apples Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place chocolate crispies in a bowl. Dip each caramel apple into crispies to coat. Repeat in batches of 4 until all apples have been coated in caramel and crispies. Chill for 1 hour to set.
